text: Datɨrɨghɨn Sabat bagha bizibar kɨrir dughiam. (Eghtɨ guaratɨzim Sabat otogham.) Ezɨ kamaghɨn aruem gevima, Arimatean gumazim Josep, Judabar kotɨn aven itir gumazir aghuir me bar fozim. A uabɨ uaghan God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam bagha mɨzuai. An atiatir puvatɨgha Iesusɨn kuam iniasa ghua Pailatɨn azai.
